hero.intro: Software Engineer with over ten years of experience, focused on code quality and performance optimization, particularly through web application refactoring. Skilled in Scrum framework, I have also led retrospectives to enhance team processes. Team cohesion is crucial to me, and I foster a collaborative environment. I particularly value pair programming and Test-Driven Development (TDD) for their effectiveness in skill development and continuous code improvement. I'm also enthusiastic about contributing to innovative projects and exploring new technologies.
